name: Frame Resizer
description:
Resize frames from an anchor point, without resize the child layers and change the constraints setting.

TIPS:

- Use ↑↓ to nudge the layer size.  Use ⇧+ ↑↓ to nudge by 10.
- Presets are save in document.
- Apply a preset to layer or user ⇧+ ↑↓ to nudge size, the layer will round to pixel.
